iati-activity.title: Local Cooperation Fund (LCF) in Serbia
iati-activity.description: The main idea of the project is to bring a group of twenty 3rd grade high school students, from the entire territory of Serbia, to spend a week in Finland enjoying educational, cultural and leisure activities. The trip would consist of visits to various Finnish governmental institutions (such as the Ministry of Foreign Affairs and the Finnish Parliament), main cultural and tourist landmarks, as well as a visit to a Finnish high school, where they would familiarize themselves with how the educational system in Finland works, but also be able to make contacts with Finnish students of their age. The twenty one students are to be selected on the agreed selection criteria and selection procedure. On the basis of their application, the first stage of selection will be performed to narrow the group down to a number of up to twenty five students, who will then be invited for a personal interview.
